bibl.title: A Late Ayyubid Report of Death Found at Quṣayr al-Qadīm.
Documents and the History of the Early Islamic World

bibl.note: Reconstruction and Dating. - The Quṣayrī Report of Death Bearing Mention of Heirs and the Dīwān al-mawārīth al-ḥashriyya. - A Reused Report of Death. - Appendix 1: P. Quseir al-Qadim Inv. PA0381 + PA0386 + PA0388 recto. Report of Death. Beginning of the 7th / 13th century; - Inv. PA0381 + PA0386 + PA0388 verso. A Letter. Beginning of the 7th / 13th century. - Appendix 2: The Geniza Model (7th / 13th century).
bibl.seg: 141.8 P. Quseir al-Qadim Inv. PA0381 + PA0386 + PA0388
Anne Regourd, A Late Ayyubid Report of Death Found at Quṣayr al-Qadīm.

Alexander T. Schubert & Petra M. Sijpesteijn (edd.), Documents and the History of the Early Islamic World = Islamic History and Civilization. Studies and Texts. 111 (Leiden - Boston, 2014) pp. 11-26, 2 pll.

Reconstruction and Dating. - The Quṣayrī Report of Death Bearing Mention of Heirs and the Dīwān al-mawārīth al-ḥashriyya. - A Reused Report of Death. - Appendix 1: P. Quseir al-Qadim Inv. PA0381 + PA0386 + PA0388 recto. Report of Death. Beginning of the 7th / 13th century; - Inv. PA0381 + PA0386 + PA0388 verso. A Letter. Beginning of the 7th / 13th century. - Appendix 2: The Geniza Model (7th / 13th century).
